TEXT.Italian: Razing cities and spreading the Ashen Veil religion will raise the Armageddon Counter. This will lead to apocalyptic events and increased aggression.
TEXT.Spanish: Arrasar ciudades y propagando la religión del Velo Ceniciento hará crecer el Contador del Armagedón. Esto conducirá a eventos apocalípticos y a un aumento de las agresiones.

TEXT.English: Often, landmarks will spawn when the map is created. These are unique improvements that are markers of events from ages past. They will often give great tile yields from the start, or other special abilities. Do what you can to control these tiles, but be sure you know what they do. Building a city near the fertile Yggdrasil is a great boon, while building near the Guardian of Pristinus Pass is quite risky.
TEXT.French: Sometimes landmarks will spawn when the map is created. These are unique improvements that are markers of events from ages past. They will often give great tile yields from the start, or other special abilities. Do what you can to control these tiles, but be sure you know what they do. Building a city near the fertile Yggdrasil is a great boon, while building near the Guardian of Pristinus Pass is quite risky.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Manchmal erscheinen Denkmäler bei der Generierung einer Karte. Diese sind überbleibsel von Ereignissen vergangener Zeiten und statten das Geländefeld, auf dem sie sich befinden, mit einzigartigen Verbesserungen, wie höheren Erträgen oder anderen speziellen Eigenschaften, aus. Die Kontrolle dieser Denkmäler ist oft hart umkämpft.
TEXT.Italian: Sometimes landmarks will spawn when the map is created. These are unique improvements that are markers of events from ages past. They will often give great tile yields from the start, or other special abilities. Do what you can to control these tiles, but be sure you know what they do. Building a city near the fertile Yggdrasil is a great boon, while building near the Guardian of Pristinus Pass is quite risky.
TEXT.Spanish: Sometimes landmarks will spawn when the map is created. These are unique improvements that are markers of events from ages past. They will often give great tile yields from the start, or other special abilities. Do what you can to control these tiles, but be sure you know what they do. Building a city near the fertile Yggdrasil is a great boon, while building near the Guardian of Pristinus Pass is quite risky.

TEXT.English: Rushing production with population is only available with the Slavery civic, available at Way of the Wicked. Doing this causes unhappiness in your cities
TEXT.French: Rushing production with population is only available with the Slavery civic, available at Way of the Wicked.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die Beschleunigung von Produktionen durch Opferung von Bevölkerung kann nur mit den Gesellschftsformen "Sklaverei" und "Opfer die Schwachen" durchgeführt werden, welche ausschließlich Nationen mit den Staatsreligionen "Schatten der Tiefe" oder "Aschfahler Schleier" vorbehalten sind.
TEXT.Italian: Rushing production with population is only available with the Slavery civic, available at Way of the Wicked.
TEXT.Spanish: Rushing production with population is only available with the Slavery civic, available at Way of the Wicked.

TEXT.English: Priests can learn the Command promotion, to have a chance to converting living enemy units that they defeat. After upgrading to high priests they can take subsequent command promotions. Command IV is only available with the Order as your state religion.
TEXT.French: Priests can learn the Command promotion, to have a chance to converting living enemy units that they defeat. After upgrading to high priests they can take subsequent command promotions. Command IV is only available to High Priests of the Order.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Priester können im späteren Spielverlauf zu Inquisitoren befördert werden. Diese haben eine Chance von 50%, besiegte lebende Einheiten zur eigenen Seite zu konvertieren.
TEXT.Italian: Priests can learn the Command promotion, to have a chance to converting living enemy units that they defeat. After upgrading to high priests they can take subsequent command promotions. Command IV is only available to High Priests of the Order.
TEXT.Spanish: Priests can learn the Command promotion, to have a chance to converting living enemy units that they defeat. After upgrading to high priests they can take subsequent command promotions. Command IV is only available to High Priests of the Order.

TEXT.English: Religious heroes will abandon you if you change religions. Demagogs will do so if you leave the Crusade civic, and Royal Guard units will leave if you change from the Aristocracy civic.
TEXT.French: Religious heroes will abandon you if you change religions. Demagogs will do so if you leave the Crusade civic, and Royal Guard units will leave if you change from the Aristocracy civic.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Religiöse Helden werden ein Reich verlassen, wenn dieses seine Staaatsreligion wechselt. Demagogen werden dies tun, wenn die Gesellschaftsform "Kreuzzug" aufgegeben wird. Und die Königlichen Garden verlassen das Reich, wenn von der Gesellschaftsform "Erbrecht" zu einer anderen gewechselt wird.
TEXT.Italian: Religious heroes will abandon you if you change religions. Demagogs will do so if you leave the Crusade civic, and Royal Guard units will leave if you change from the Aristocracy civic.
TEXT.Spanish: Los héroes religiosos te abandonarán si cambias de religión. Los Demagogos harán lo mismo si abandonas la doctrina Cruzada, y las unidades Guardia Real si dejas la doctrina Aristocracia.

TEXT.English: The arrival of the Infernal civilization will also begin transforming the world into hell. Work to lower the Armageddon Counter if you want to keep this from spreading to your lands.
TEXT.French: The arrival of the Infernal civilization will also begin transforming the world into hell. Work to lower the Armageddon Counter if you want to keep this from spreading to your lands.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Mit dem Auftreten der dämonischen Zivilisation verändert sich die Welt hin zu einer Höllenlandschaft. Nur die Senkung des Armageddonzählers kann die weitere Verbreitung der Höllenlandschaft verhindern.
TEXT.Italian: The arrival of the Infernal civilization will also begin transforming the world into hell. Work to lower the Armageddon Counter if you want to keep this from spreading to your lands.
TEXT.Spanish: Con la llegada de la civilización infernal empezará la transformación del mundo en un infierno. Trabaja para reducir el Contador del Armagedón si quieres prevenir que se extienda por tus tierras.

TEXT.English: All players who learn a religion founding tech will receive a disciple of that religion, though only the first gets the benefits of a Holy City.
TEXT.French: All players who learn a religion founding tech will receive a disciple of that religion, though only the first gets the benefits of a Holy City.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die Erforschung einer Technologie, die eine Religion begründet, gewährt eine Geweihte Einheit dieser Religion. Allerdings erhält nur der erste Erforscher den Vorteil einer Heiligen Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: All players who learn a religion founding tech will receive a disciple of that religion, though only the first gets the benefits of a Holy City.
TEXT.Spanish: Todos los jugadores que aprendan una tecnología de fundación religiosa recibirá un discípulo de esa religión, aunque sólo los primeros consiguen los beneficios de una Ciudad Santa.

TEXT.English: Each Civilization has distinct benefits and drawbacks. The Grigori, for example, cannot adopt a state religion--but watch out for their many heroes!
TEXT.French: Each Civilization has distinct benefits and drawbacks. The Grigori, for example, cannot adopt a state religion--but watch out for their many heroes!
TEXT.German: Tipp... Jede Zivilisation hat ausgeprägte Vor- und Nachteile. Die Grigori können beispielsweise keine Staatsreligion wählen, sind aber ein Hort für viele Helden!
TEXT.Italian: Each Civilization has distinct benefits and drawbacks. The Grigori, for example, cannot adopt a state religion--but watch out for their many heroes!
TEXT.Spanish: Cada Civilización tiene distintos pros y contras. Grigori, por ejemplo, no puede adoptar una religión oficial... ¡pero cuidado con su gran cantidad de héroes!

TEXT.English: Not every city can occupy an ideal location. Some cities can be placed to acquire resources or make use of marginal terrain. Keep an eye on your cities' maintenance costs, so that you do not expand too quickly and stifle your economy.
TEXT.French: Toutes les villes ne peuvent pas être fondées sur des emplacements parfaits. Certaines peuvent être placées stratégiquement pour exploiter des ressources ou occuper des terrains secondaires. Gardez toujours un œil sur les coûts d'entretien de vos villes afin de ne pas croître trop rapidement au risque d'étouffer votre économie.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Nicht für jede neue Stadt lässt sich ein idealer Ort finden. Manche Städte können sich an Schlüsselpositionen schon allein deshalb lohnen, nur um eine Ressource zu erschließen oder verschiedene Gewässer zu verbinden. Vorsicht ist aber bei den laufenden Kosten geboten, denn eine zu schnelle Expansion belastet die Staatskasse.
TEXT.Italian: Not every city can occupy an ideal location. Some cities can be placed to acquire resources or make use of marginal terrain. Keep an eye on your cities' maintenance costs, so that you do not expand too quickly and stifle your economy.
TEXT.Spanish: No todas las ciudades tienen que ocupar una localización ideal. Algunas pueden emplazarse para adquirir recursos o hacer uso de terreno marginal. Échale un ojo a los costes de mantenimiento de tus ciudades, para que no te expandas demasiado rápido y ahogues tu economía.

TEXT.English: Elven workers (and slaves) can build cottages, farms, and plantations on top of forests. This is extremely useful for extra production and health.
TEXT.French: Elven workers (and slaves) can build cottages, farms, and plantations on top of forests. This is extremely useful for extra production and health.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Elfen-Arbeitstrupps (und diesselben als Sklaven) können Gehöfte, Getreidefelder und Plantagen in Wäldern errichten. Das ist extrem nützlich für zusätzliche Produktion und Gesundheit.
TEXT.Italian: Elven workers (and slaves) can build cottages, farms, and plantations on top of forests. This is extremely useful for extra production and health.
TEXT.Spanish: Los trabajadores elfos (y esclavos) pueden construir villas, granjas y plantaciones encima de los bosques. Esto es extremadamente útil para tener producción extra y salud.

TEXT.English: Hidden nationality units, such as animals, can attack without declaring war. Be aware however that this works both ways, and they can also BE attacked by civs you are not at war with, without causing war. If you have many Hidden Nationality units, beware of opening your borders, and remember that the territory of your supposed "friends" is not a safe place for these units
TEXT.French: Hidden nationality units, such as animals, can attack without declaring war.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Einheiten mit verborgener Nationalität und Raubtiere können ohne Kriegserklärung angreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Hidden nationality units, such as animals, can attack without declaring war.
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades con Nacionalidad Oculta, como los animales, pueden atacar sin declarar la guerra.

TEXT.English: Some leaders have the adaptive trait. This will allow their player to choose a new trait periodically. Plan ahead to be aggressive or raiders during war and financial or philosophical during peace.
TEXT.French: Some leaders have the adaptive trait. This will allow their player to choose a new trait periodically. Plan ahead to be aggressive or raiders during war and financial or philosophical during peace.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Einige Oberhäupter verfügen über die Eigenschaft "Adaptiv". Dadurch kann periodisch eine neue Eigenschaft gewählt werden. Mit der richtigen Vorausplanung ist es so möglich, während eines Krieges die Eigenschaften "Aggressiv" oder "Räuberisch" zu nutzen und in Friedenszeiten "Kommerziell" oder "Philosopisch".
TEXT.Italian: Some leaders have the adaptive trait. This will allow their player to choose a new trait periodically. Plan ahead to be aggressive or raiders during war and financial or philosophical during peace.
TEXT.Spanish: Algunos líderes tienen el rasgo adaptabilidad. Esto permitirá a su jugador elegir un nuevo rasgo periódicamente. Planea ser agresivo o saqueadores durante la guerra, y financiero o filosófico durante la paz.

TEXT.English: There are more options for victory. Religious requires using diplomacy--and inquisitors--to spread a religion you control far and wide. To build the Tower of Mastery, you must control a diverse assortment of mana, and the Altar of the Luonnatar can give the win to those who grow lots of great prophets.
TEXT.French: There are more options for victory. Religious requires using diplomacy--and inquisitors--to spread a religion you control far and wide. To build the Tower of Mastery, you must control a diverse assortment of mana, and the Altar of the Luonnatar can give the win to those who grow lots of great prophets.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Es gibt mehrere Siegmöglichkeiten. Ein Religionssieg erfordert Diplomatie und Inquisitoren, um die eigene Religion weit zu verbreiten. Um den Turm der Macht zu errichten, müssen viele verschiedene Manaquellen beherrscht werden. Der Altar der Luonnatar bedeutet den Sieg für jenes Reich, das viele Große Propheten hervorbringt.
TEXT.Italian: There are more options for victory. Religious requires using diplomacy--and inquisitors--to spread a religion you control far and wide. To build the Tower of Mastery, you must control a diverse assortment of mana, and the Altar of the Luonnatar can give the win to those who grow lots of great prophets.
TEXT.Spanish: Hay más opciones para la victoria. La religiosa requiere usar la diplomacia (e inquisidores) para propagar lejos y sabiamente la religión que controles. Para construir la Torre de la Maestría, debes tener un surtido variado de maná, y el Altar de los Luonnatar concede la victoria a aquel quien haga crecer a un monton de grandes profetas.

TEXT.English: Adjust the game options to fit the play experience you want, such as no Armageddon Counter, more animals--or even a world already filled with barbarian cities!
TEXT.French: Adjust the game options to fit the play experience you want, such as no Armageddon Counter, more animals--or even a world already filled with barbarian cities!
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die Spieleinstellungen können entsprechend dem gewünschten Spielerlebnis geändert werden, so dass es beispielsweise keinen Armageddonzähler gibt, mehr Tiere umherstreifen oder die Welt bereits mit unzähligen Barbarenstädten bevölkert ist!
TEXT.Italian: Adjust the game options to fit the play experience you want, such as no Armageddon Counter, more animals--or even a world already filled with barbarian cities!
TEXT.Spanish: Ajusta las opciones de juego para poner a punto la experiencia de juego que quieres, como "sin Contador del Armagedón", "más animales"... ¡o incluso un mundo ya lleno de ciudades bárbaras!

TEXT.English: A leader with the Barbarian trait has nothing to fear from the orcs that seek to ravage other player's lands, though they must still contend with animals. Use this to your advantage, but beware, if your score grows too much higher than your rivals your peace with the barbarians will end.
TEXT.French: A leader with the Barbarian trait has nothing to fear from the orcs that seek to ravage other player's lands, though they must still contend with animals. Use this to your advantage, but beware, if your score grows too much higher than your rivals your peace with the barbarians will end.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Ein Oberhaupt mit der Eigenschaft "Barbarisch" hat nichts von den Orks zu befürchten, die die Ländereien anderer Reiche verwüsten. Dennoch muss er sich mit umherstreifenden Tieren auseinandersetzen. Dieser Vorteil kann sich aber auch negativ auswirken. Denn wenn der Punktestand im Vergleich zu den anderen Oberhäuptern zu hoch wird, endet der Frieden mit den Barbaren.
TEXT.Italian: A leader with the Barbarian trait has nothing to fear from the orcs that seek to ravage other player's lands, though they must still contend with animals. Use this to your advantage, but beware, if your score grows too much higher than your rivals your peace with the barbarians will end.
TEXT.Spanish: Un líder con el rasgo Bárbaro no tiene nada que temer de los orcos que buscan hacer estragos a las otras tierras de los jugadores, aunque aún tienen que enfrentarse a los animales. Utiliza esto para tu ventaja, pero cuidado, si tu puntuación crece más alta que la de tus rivales la paz con los bárbaros terminará.

TEXT.English: Random events will strike players based partly on their in-game actions. Often the options you have to react to these opportunities depend on your state religion, buildings present, or gold on hand.
TEXT.French: Unless turned off, random events will strike players based partly on their in-game actions. Often the options you have to react to these opportunities depend on your state religion, buildings present, or gold on hand.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Sofern nicht ausgeschaltet, treten zufällige Ereignisse auf, die zum Teil auf den Taten der laufenden Partie basieren. Oft sind die Möglichkeiten, auf ein Ereignis zu reagieren, von der Staatsreligion und den vorhandenen Gilden abhängig.
TEXT.Italian: Unless turned off, random events will strike players based partly on their in-game actions. Often the options you have to react to these opportunities depend on your state religion, buildings present, or gold on hand.
TEXT.Spanish: Unless turned off, random events will strike players based partly on their in-game actions. Often the options you have to react to these opportunities depend on your state religion, buildings present, or gold on hand.

TEXT.English: Exploration is vital not only to search for tribal villages and resources to settle near, but to find monster lairs such as barrows and ruins. Destroy these as soon as you can--unless, perhaps, if they are nearer to your rivals than to you.
TEXT.French: Exploration is vital not only to search for tribal villages and resources to settle near, but to find monster lairs such as barrows and ruins. Destroy these as soon as you can--unless, perhaps, if they are nearer to your rivals than to you.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Erkundung ist nicht nur wichtig, um Eingeborenendörfer und rohstoffreiche Siedlungsplätze zu finden, sondern auch um Monsterlager wie Hügelgräber oder Ruinen zu finden. Diese sollten so schnell wie möglich zerstört werden, sofern sie nicht näher an einer feindlichen Grenze liegen als an der eigenen.
TEXT.Italian: Exploration is vital not only to search for tribal villages and resources to settle near, but to find monster lairs such as barrows and ruins. Destroy these as soon as you can--unless, perhaps, if they are nearer to your rivals than to you.
TEXT.Spanish: La Exploración es vital no sólo para buscar aldeas tribales y recursos explotables, también es para encontrar guaridas de monstruos como túmulos y ruinas. Destruyelas tan pronto como puedas... excepto, quizás, si están más cerca de tus rivales que de tí.

TEXT.English: The Mercurian and Infernal civilizations are not of the mortal world, so you cannot begin play as either. But if you call them into the world you will be given the option to play as these powerful civilizations. Call the Infernals by researching Infernal Pact; the Mercurians can be brought in by building the Mercurian gate wonder.
TEXT.French: The Mercurian and Infernal civilizations are not of the mortal world, so you cannot begin play as either. But if you call them into the world you will be given the option to play as these powerful civilizations. Call the Infernals by researching Infernal Pact; the Mercurians can be brought in by building the Mercurian gate wonder.
TEXT.German: Tipp... Die merkurianische und die infernalische Zivilisation sind nicht Teil der Welt der Sterblichen und können daher bei Spielbeginn nicht ausgewählt werden. Aber wem es gelingt, sie in diese Welt zu locken, erhält die Möglichkeit, als eine dieser mächtigen Zivilisation weiterzuspielen. Die Dämonen werden von demjenigen gerufen, der als Erster die Technologie "Höllischer Pakt" erforscht. Von da an können die Mercurianer durch den Bau des Weltwunders "Tor der Mercurianer" herbeigerufen werden.
TEXT.Italian: The Mercurian and Infernal civilizations are not of the mortal world, so you cannot begin play as either. But if you call them into the world you will be given the option to play as these powerful civilizations. Call the Infernals by researching Infernal Pact; the Mercurians can be brought in by building the Mercurian gate wonder.
TEXT.Spanish: The Mercurian and Infernal civilizations are not of the mortal world, so you cannot begin play as either. But if you call them into the world you will be given the option to play as these powerful civilizations. Call the Infernals by researching Infernal Pact; the Mercurians can be brought in by building the Mercurian gate wonder.
